title: Remove profile picture upload from login screen

requirements.summary: Remove the profile picture upload component from the login/profile setup flow in LoginPage.tsx
acceptanceCriteria: The ProfilePictureUpload component is no longer rendered in LoginPage.tsx
Users can complete login by entering only their display name
No profile picture field is visible during the setup flow

file_operations.description: Remove the ProfilePictureUpload component import and its usage from the profile setup form. Remove the profilePicture state variable and its associated logic. Update the form to only collect displayName input. Ensure the profile creation flow works with displayName only.

requirements.summary: Update the user profile mutation hook to send null or empty profilePicture when creating profiles
acceptanceCriteria: The profile creation mutation in useQueries.ts does not include profilePicture data
Profile creation succeeds without uploading an image

file_operations.description: Update the saveCallerUserProfile mutation to pass a UserProfile object with only displayName, omitting the profilePicture field entirely or passing undefined. Ensure the mutation works correctly without profile picture data and handles the backend response appropriately.
